description: Square of lower triangular normalized 2nd kind Stirling matrix.
formula: Numerators of lower triangle of (a[ i, j ])^2 where a[ i, j ] = S(i, j)/BellNumber(i) if j<=i, 0 if j>i
mathematica: rows = 8; m = Table[If[k <= n, StirlingS2[n, k]/BellB[n], 0], {n, 1, rows}, {k, 1, rows}]; m2 = m.m; Table[fracs = m2[[i]]; nums = fracs // Numerator; dens = fracs // Denominator; lcm = LCM @@ dens; Table[ nums[[j]]*lcm/dens[[j]], {j, 1, i}], {i, 1, rows}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Mar 05 2013 *)
author: _Olivier Gérard_
